Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' depends_on_property cannot be equal to source_id (property name) Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim propName As String = Me.getPropertyAttribute("source_id","keyed_name","") If propName = "" Then Dim itm As Item = inn.getItemById("Property",Me.getProperty("source_id","invalid")) propName = itm.getProperty("name","") End If
If Me.getProperty("depends_on_property","") = propName Then Return inn.newError("The 'Depends On Property' cannot be the same as 'Property' !") End If
'get some property values of parent of parent (ItemType) of this relationship Dim propItem As Item = Me.newItem("Property","get") propItem.setId(Me.getProperty("source_id","invalid")) propItem.setAttribute("select","source_id(is_relationship,name)") propItem = propItem.apply()
' if itemType is relationship set relavant flag on this relationship, too If Not propItem.isError() Then Me.setProperty("is_relationship", propItem.getPropertyItem("source_id").getProperty("is_relationship",""))
'if user message typed in, then disconnect the link to user message from library If (Me.getProperty("property_check_user_message","") <> "") Then Me.setProperty("property_check_user_message_id","")
Return Me
Item.name: Property LC State Check onAdd
